root: ^(I see John, it looks like he is deep in thought, staring deeply at the lake)
^(I'm not sure if I should bother him, maybe I'll come back later)
^Hey kid, I can see you, you know.
^Oh, uh hi Mr. John, I came as your requested.
^You know, my wife, kid, and I used to like taking walks around the lake.
^Sometimes my kid woud jump into the lake and get herself all wet and walk around the village drenched.
^You have some great memories with your family.
^Yeah, but that's all they're all now, just memories. They both passed away a few months back.
^They both grew very ill, but the village didn't have anymore medicine due to no Royal Flower Pickers coming to our village and giving us any medicinal herbs or plants.
^Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to bring up something painful...
^Don't be, it ain't your fault kid. That's why I'm asking you to get get those flowers, I plan on making an arrangement for their graves.
^In hopes they can finally be at peace. (or maybe I could be at peace, I'm not sure anymore)
^I see, so thats why you gathered the White flowers, they are symbolic for a passing of a loved one.
^Yeah, I figured, but I feel like I should add more to the arrangement. Which is why I called you here.

^Purple were both my wife and kid's favorite color, they would come here and pick some purple flowers and bring them home. Of course, they didn't last long because they weren't picked by a Royal Flower Picker and their Flora Goddess blessing.
^I see, well I'll be glad to help, especially for your wife and daughter, I'm sure they were wonderful people to be around.
